attributes.action: Change the start of school from 8:30 am to 10:00 am
attributes.additional_details: The reason I want government and parliament to do it is because school days are very long and students have to sit down for hours, they also have to wake up early which is not good for them.
attributes.background: Change the start of school days to 10:00 am instead of 8:30 am

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612113
